# [pixi](../../../pixi.md) [workspace](../../workspace.md) [register](../register.md) remove

Remove a workspace from registry

--8<-- "docs/reference/cli/pixi/workspace/register/remove_extender:description"

## Usage
```
pixi workspace register remove <NAME>
```

## Arguments
- <a id="arg-<NAME>" href="#arg-<NAME>">`<NAME>`</a>
:  Name of the workspace to unregister
<br>**required**: `true`
